EmailTemplate.description: Email template used to send manager an email letting them know a new exception request is pending their approval.
EmailTemplate.name: Exception Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Price Changes – Action Needed: Exception Request Pending Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have a new price change process exception request pending your review. Please click here (https://officedepot.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=01rE0000000DGWA&ic=1) to review and disposition this request. Your timely response reduces Office Depot’s margin erosion, so please review your team’s requests ASAP.
Thank you! Office Depot Contract Division
Note: This is a system generated email. Please DO NOT reply to this email.
